timeline.author: Frawless

replies.bodyText: I need to get some info from Maros about clients -> but if you set different CONSUMER_GROUP you'll receive all messages until that moment -> not just messages you set in setMessagesCount. So maybe it's problem in VerifiableClient. But in the original test (before refactor of the clients) was it this way.
replies.author: im-konge

replies.bodyText: Can you open the issue for it? We should understand what's happening here.
replies.author: Frawless

replies.bodyText: Yeah sure -> how I said - maybe it's fault in understanding from my side, we will see.
replies.author: im-konge

timeline.bodyText: Wouldn't it be better to check this list size in waitForPodDeletion() ?
timeline.author: Frawless

timeline.bodyText: this assert can be written just one time outside of the if(s), it's common to both.
timeline.author: ppatierno
